text: Akshay Bhatia (born January 31, 2002) is an American professional golfer. Bhatia was born in Northridge, California, and lives in Wake Forest, North Carolina. He was runner-up at the 2018 U.S. Junior Amateur. Won his first PGA tournament in 2023 which made him eligible for The Sentry in Hawaii in January 2024. Category:2002 births Category:American golfers Category:Living people
title: Akshay Bhatia
